title: Fire destroys S. Korean government's cloud storage system, no backups available
author: ksec
aiHeadline: South Korea's government cloud storage goes up in flames, proving that even in the digital age, fire is still a thing.

title: Americans increasingly see legal sports betting as a bad thing for society

title: The deadline isn't when AI outsmarts us – it's when we stop using our own minds
author: NotInOurNames
aiHeadline: AI might not be the real threat—maybe it's us stopping using our brains that's the bigger issue.
